thread.title: Grey's Anatomy Sneak Peek: Maggie's Never Going to Live Down Her One-Night Stand
thread.title_full: Grey's Anatomy Sneak Peek: Maggie's Never Going to Live Down Her One-Night Stand

author: TV Guide
title: Grey's Anatomy Sneak Peek: Maggie's Never Going to Live Down Her One-Night Stand
text: Posted Oct. 13, 2015 at 10:11 AM Updated at 1:00 PM Posted Oct. 13, 2015 at 10:11 AM Updated at 1:00 PM Â» Social News Historically, on Grey's Anatomy , one-night stands between interns and staff doctors have worked out pretty well for the most part ( R.I.P. MerDer ). But for Maggie ( Kelly McCreary ), she first needs to get past the mortifyingly awkward morning after. Her and Andrew's (Giacomo Gianniotti) alcohol-fueled hookup at the end of last week's episode left us wondering whether the socially challenged Maggie is finally going to get a solid love interest. But let's not get ahead of ourselves - for now, she's just trying to make sure Andrew can sneak out of the house unnoticed by either Amelia ( Caterina Scorsone ) or Meredith ( Ellen Pompeo ). Or, you know, one of Meredith's children. Two guesses how that goes ... Check out an exclusive sneak peek of this week's episode above. Grey's Anatomy airs Thursdays at 8/7c on ABC. Are you rooting for a Maggie/Andrew romance? Other Links From TVGuide.com
